objects.specification: A smooth light gray vinyl classroom floor with subtle matte texture, durable finish and gentle sheen, suitable for heavy foot traffic and easy cleaning.
A smooth plaster wall painted in warm earth tones with a subtle green accent trim at mid-height, providing a neutral backdrop for educational displays.

A larger teacher’s desk with a rich walnut wood-grain surface, sturdy squared legs, integrated drawers with metal handles on one side, modesty panel below, and a smooth polished finish conveying authority and functionality.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a high-gloss, easy-erase surface, framed in slim aluminum trim, featuring subtle dinosaur silhouette graphics along the top edge in muted earth-tone accents.
A rectangular student desk with a natural wood-grain laminated surface, four slender metal legs in a warm wood tone finish, modesty panel, smooth rounded edges, mid-century classroom aesthetic.

A realistic dinosaur skeleton replica composed of elongated, curved bone-like elements assembled into a life-size articulated skeleton. The off-white bones exhibit subtle weathering textures, smooth joints, and a lightly matte finish.
A dinosaur educational poster featuring vivid illustrations of a specific species, labeled anatomy and facts in a vintage museum style, printed on a matte parchment-textured background.

A tall wooden bookshelf in medium wood tone with five adjustable shelves filled with colorful dinosaur books and small fossil models, solid side panels and backboard.
A large rectangular window with clear glass divided by thin mullions, framed in light wood trim, dressed with simple earth-tone green fabric curtains hanging from a slim rod.
A circular wall clock with a clean white face, black numeric markers, slender black hands, encased in a round wooden frame with a subtle matte finish.
A potted plant with lush green broad leaves, organic ceramic pot in natural beige finish, soil visible at the top and a slight glossy sheen on foliage.
